creator: redshift@pandora.be
text:
http://edgeos.com/threats/details.php?id=11413
http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/bulletin/ms03-007.mspx
http://users.pandora.be/redshift/log.Txt

Appearntly, using the strings used in a piece of my logs, this thing blocked 
my server. It didn't respond to any requests, and took the whole server down, 
ftp wouldn't work, namelookups fail, terminal server doesn't respond.

After a few hours the server comes back. It doesn't reboot or anything, but 
does some serious fucking up.
The SEARCH exploit is for IIS, it does not affect Apache.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
